title: Grain boundary generation via steering CuxP2Ox+5 precursor composition enhances CO electrolysis
content:
Energy Environ. Sci., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4EE01258E, Paper
Jiaqi Sang, Tianfu Liu, Pengfei Wei, Hefei Li, Conghui Liu, Yi Wang, Youwen Rong, Qi Wang, Guoxiong Wang, Xinhe Bao
High-density grain boundary generation via electrochemical reconstruction is achieved by adjusting Cu atom density in the precursor lattice of CuxP2Ox+5, thus promoting CO electrolysis for C2+ production.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
